unicef-a6.def: Percentage of students aged 13-15 years who reported being bullied on one or more days in the past 30 days.
unicef-a6.name: Protection, Bullying
unicef-a6.source: Health Behaviour in School-aged Children Study (HBSC) and Global School-based Student Health Surveys (GSHS). Last update: July 2021.
